I love Pepperonis pizza. I was turned off from this location after going in to place an order and the male cashier was wearing a bloody bandaid ,and proceeded to make pizzas after he took my order, with NO GLOVES. I told the manager and he sent him home. They are lucky I did not call the health department.
Cold rainy Friday night calls for pizza delivery! Tried three different pizzas and they were all delicious!
Very good. Nice portions. Fresh veggies. Nice twist on "red sauce". Will be back. Soon.

Great pizza
If you wanna eat a pizza that tastes like a cardboard, go here! I am so disappointed!!!! I spent 20$ for a BBQ Chicken pizza and it tasted like a cardboard!!!!
Great pizza!!

Loved it
Loveeeee the pizza here.
We ordered takeout and my 6 year old granddaughter was not allowed the restroom which was right by where we picked up the food. PS the food was subpar.
I and my friends visited twice while in teh area. What a great location and atmosphere. The staff was warm, friendly and fast.
Gread pizza, good staff.
Really good pizza. Coming from a road warrior, this is a compliment. I am impressed. Great service too.  Wings are your typical wings.
Good staff
The pizza was delicious and fresh. Also had a ceasar salad and hot wings and was all good. The service was excellent! Will definitely come back.
Wondering how this thing g I got was considered a NY pie. Seems like the kinda place you take an 8 year old for pizza. Just lacks quality and flavor.
Pizza is good as always. Our delivery driver was so sweet and kind.
Terrible customer service will not return

Good food, good ingredients.  But an unreasonably hostile work environment with little to no management or hierarchy. ALL employees break the no cellphone rule, along with many others. Rude employees and some level of disregard for hygiene. …
Worst food ever ! The philly was dry the mozzarella sticks were cold and the cheese was never melted and delivery was not expeditious I do not recommend

Hard to find the place if you've never previously been and it's dark out. The cashier I picked up from was an older gentleman , who was very nice, helpful and polite. Thanks for the amazing oven baked wings and pizza!
Best pizza in town.
Is Beautiful and the food is delicious
Wish they had more locations! Buffalo chicken pizza is to die for!
Excellent customer service and great pizza; it even has keto friendly pizza crust for my girlfriend!
Great pizza and fast service 👍👌

***** If I could give more stars, I would!  Pepperoni's always has my food out fresh and hot!  I always order through Doordash, but I wanted to come on their own website to let everyone know you cannot go wrong with this place.  Great Prices & Great Food!

Cheese wasn’t completely melted, they didn’t pay attention to time requested for the pizza and it was delivered much earlier than asked for, small pizza is really a personal size, the pizza and chicken wings weren’t very good. And everything was cold when it arrived.
Selection of pizzas

Pretty good pizza.  I ordered the New Yorker which kind of reminded me of the street pizza in NYC.  The crust was good and ingredients were good.  Driver was awesome, since he actually came up to our apt instead of me having to walk down.
Very nice young lady at the register and the pizza is muy bueno 👍🏼 anyone who says it’s on the pricier side must prefer some gross big chain pizza like papa johns. Pepperoni’s was worth every penny.

Pros: 1) Tasty 2) Pretty cheap 3) Doesnt feel super unhealthy 4) Sauce isn’t super tomatoey or too oily, but has a slight hint of spicyness  Cons: 1) No room to sit down and eat pizza inside (I didn’t research before going there!)  Neutrals: 1) Was hungry, forgot to take picture of pizza
I love the chicken wings from here. But waiting time too long.

Delicious fresh pizza, fast and hot.

Absolutely delicious, GREAT PRICES, fast and friendly service/delivery..so good, I already started to eat before I realized I should review such awesomeness! Great pizza ...try the Pesto chicken Great pasta.. perfect amount of sauce and flavor. Lasagna and fettuccine Alfredo are delicious.
Good pizza, not perfect but good. Please do not try the cauliflower crust. It tastes like cardboard and even worse coming back up. Everything else is great.
Mediterranean pizza and Greek salad were excellent. Delivered to La Quinta Galleria within minutes. Much thanks.
Actually its worth about 4.5 stars but not sure how to give it a half less? Only reason for a deduction is i feel its a little pricey but the pizzas are good though so perhaps i shouldn't complain!
Good food
Mouth watering pizza
Slowed franchise ever!! Waited for Stephanie’s order for 45 min. When it was dead. That old man whose a cashier is deaf
Over the Top!!! My Newyorker Pizza was amazing...  Thankyou Ms.Gaby for your great service and recommendations...
Staff very friendly and helpful. Great Food!

I ordered thru doordash and this pizza is soooooooo good!!  Not only is the pizza good the wings are bomb too!!! the price is very reasonable. I believe i have found one of my favorite pizza spots. will be ordering again!! one of everything on the menu please!!!!
We really like the pizza here! Good, crispy crust, and nice toppings. Big fan of the Italian sausage. Not a lot of seating, but we live close by so we always do take-out.

Very good pizza. Tiny little place could use some more seating. Local chain just wish they had more locations in the Houston area. Definitely better than any of the national chains. Good meatball sandwich to. Like their bread and meatballs and marinara.

(Translated by Google) It is the best pizza that I have eaten in Houston has a different taste is Chicago style. Your staff is excellent I ordered a Delivery and they give you a time of 45 minutes to an hour and I arrive in 35 minutes are …
This place is unreal!

We had an enjoyable lunch. I decided to try their new pizza in the menu while my boyfriend ordered a large cheese pizza with mushrooms. Everything was prepared fresh and was tasty. The service was good too. Will definitely visit this place again in the near future.

Great food and a friendly staff.  The pizza is great - nice, crispy crust.  We love going here for lunch as its pretty close to the office and they are always quick to serve.  Give 'em a try - it's worth it!
Our waitress was so great! So nice, so funny, welcoming, and she was busy, we were not her only table, and she was awesome!
Amazing wings

First time trying this place and the pizza is very good. The large is quite large and the toppings are great quality. The sauce is indeed delicious. I would not say this is actually New York style as others have stated but that is just fine …
My favorite pizza spot to go to!
2 words for you - Pepperoni Rolls!  Seriously, my favorite pizza place, that offers so much more.  Wings are great, subs are great, salads are AMAZING!  Love it!
The best pizza ...👍👍 my favorite.... near Galleria... Very good...
Best pizza in Houston, love their sauce!!

Being a business owner myself, I can't say enough about Pepperoni's.  Been working in the galleria the last 15 years and couldn't wait until they opened one near my shop.  I buy my employees lunches every Friday and we all are taking …
So glad they finally opened a location in the Galleria! Their pizza is excellent and they have really good sandwiches as well.

Pepperoni's makes really delicious pizza, and Ive never been disappointed by the quality. Im glad they've opened this new location in the galleria area. I at a meatlover pizza from here yesterday, and it was the best part of the day.

Doing some shopping with a friend in Houston on Monday and needed to grab some lunch.  We were both so pleasantly surprised with our visit.  We each ordered a lunch special.  I had the small margherita and Greek salad.  I judge my pizza by …
Best pizza in Houston! Ordered the Pepperoni’s Special and the toppings were fresh and flavorful. The crust and sauce are some of the best you will find.
